</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the numerical index for the distribution region of this copy of [[<template><title>arma</title></template>]].

# Rest of the world </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
